about_the_game:
Welcome to Trippy's Disc Golf, an open world disc golf experience where you can explore a map and throw discs from wherever to wherever you like!

In Trippy's Disc Golf, you'll be able to explore several maps as they are built out and added to the game, seeing vastly different maps, ranging from a casual little forest with a cute village nearby, or play disc golf around an active volcano! Maps are still being made and will be included at no charge to people who have purchased the game!

As with maps, you will have a variety of discs to choose from, with more coming out after release for free to the user!

With dynamic weather, a sun that moves based on your real time, and lanterns that light up at appropriate hours, we hope that this game is a little immersive, so that you can enjoy the sights to behold in the environment, as beautiful god-rays pierce the clouds and shadows are cast by the trees.

Welcome to Trippy's Disc Golf, an open world disc golf experience where you can explore a map and throw discs from wherever to wherever you like!

In Trippy's Disc Golf, you'll be able to explore several maps as they are built out and added to the game, seeing vastly different maps, ranging from a casual little forest with a cute village nearby, or play disc golf around an active volcano! Maps are still being made and will be included at no charge to people who have purchased the game!

As with maps, you will have a variety of discs to choose from, with more coming out after release for free to the user!

With dynamic weather, a sun that moves based on your real time, and lanterns that light up at appropriate hours, we hope that this game is a little immersive, so that you can enjoy the sights to behold in the environment, as beautiful god-rays pierce the clouds and shadows are cast by the trees.
name: Trippy's Disc Golf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Trippy's Disc Golf: Immerse yourself in an open-world environment and conquer challenging courses. Throw discs, master precision, and explore handcrafted landscapes.
